review: Fantastic place, great vegan food( tuk tuk bowl highly recommend). Very relaxet cool customer base, and all of the staff there are fantastic. The young manager there is very impressive. Best service in hikkaduwa( salty swarmis is great too). Highly recommend ❤️
Lovely place next to the beach! Great food and nice accommodation (we stayed in a private room). Can highly recommend the Mandala Burger. Fair prices.

Located by the beach, Steffi's provides a perfect view of the long coastline of Hikkaduwa. 

Also, they only serve vegetarian food, which was a refreshing change from other places which have limited veg options.
We spent two nights here and can recommend this place so much. Directly by the beach, beautiful view over the ocean, clean rooms, delicious food and very friendly staff!
Food is absolutely amazing, had a kidney burger, burrito bowl and smoothie bowl and I f**** loved everything. Really nice staff, amazing food, great location, just go there!!
very good food, nice environment.  a little slower service, which is common in Sri Lanka.  I recommend the burger and poached eggs.  the iced tea was also very good.

We had a great lunch at steffis place. Had the avocado sandwich, super good, tasty  and great option, super enjoyable place with a great staff. Smily and excellent service. Highly recommended and will be back in future time.
The best food i've ever ate!!!  I will recommend to everyone  really good salads, burgers and scrambled eggs.

We had breakfast here twice and dinner once, and had a great experience every time. The food was wholesome and delicious with amazing presentation. There are some comfy beanbags which were great for our kids to sit on. What made this place stand out for...us was the exceptional service. There was a lovely young guy working there who switched the bread on our kids food to a softer pitta bread so it would be easier for them to eat - his idea and they loved it! They were very helpful too in making up lovely fruit places for them to eat. Even in power blackouts they had a special menu which was great also. I love Steffi's Mandala! Their food is so tasty with many vegan options. The staff is remarkably friendly and hospitable. I love to go to Steffi's Mandala for breakfast or lunch. Monday evenings they also have live music with a very nice atmosphere.

Perfect choice for breakfast or lunch. Right on the beach and beautifully decorated. I had the multivitamin juice, coffee and avocado toast with egg. All were delicious and I’m now back for a second time. The staff are also really nice. Highly recommended if you’re...looking for somewhere with a cool vibe and great food and drin looking for somewhere with a cool vibe and great food and drinks.
Amazing food. Recommend burger, sour bread and juices. Top chips (fries). Fast and attentive service with good English. 10/10, would eat again

Mandalla/ Hikkaduwa was our last destination during our 4 weeks trip through Sri Lanka. We saw this beautiful location and directly booked the double room with a huge terrace where you could see the ocean, doing yoga, enjoying mornings and evenings. 

Waking up to soft...waves - having a beach directly to your feet in combination with the best coffee and food felt like heaven on earth. Steffi, Techni and all the other Crew were always right there and made all our wishes come true - just ask them. You will have a quite place to sleep with a lot of opportunities / Bars/ Restaurants around the Mandala if you fancy a louder place or so. We were very pleased by the smooth relaxing feeling , the location gave us. Perfect also, if you have to combine working and vacation. 

The room and space was always super clean. The shower was really nice, the double room had enough space and much natural light.

You can rent surfboards right next to the location, grocery stores are a few meters away and you are very close to the city.

Our flight was leaving super late on the day of the check out and we could stay here , leaving our backoacks at the bar - enjoying the waves and sunset. 

Make sure you definitely stay longer here, when you book the paradise right on the beach. 

Our number 1 recommendation for Hikkaduwa!
